name: Car Deal Application
shortDescription: This is a full stack website. This is a car selling web application.
description1: User Can Buy a Car and Billing for purchase car and User can gives a review.
description2: User create his account by sign up, after he sign in for billing a car.
description3: Buyer can see his order on his dashboard and he can gives review.
description4: Admin manage order, manage products, make an admin another person.
description5: Buyer can order car and deal with admin panel.

name: Softy Shop
shortDescription: This is a E-commerce website. Customer get the service for market of this site.
description1: User Can Buy Product above from the menu of header.
description2: User can see product detail by clicking the product card.
description3: User can product add to wishlist for buy future.
description4: User can increment decrement product quantity in the cart.
description5: User and admin have individual dashboard.

name: Technology Store Web Application
shortDescription: This is a full stack website. This is computer shop related web application.
description1: Products can be seen by dropdown selecting each brand's products in the Top Product section.
description2: Product cards have to be clickable. When clicking the card it goes to the product details route.
description3: This website has a dashboard for buyers. Buyer can see his order in the dashboard and he can give reviews of products.
description4: Is there an authentication system email password and google sign in.
description5: Buyer can payment his order by via Stripe.

name: Red Onion Application
shortDescription: Restaurant website building by React Js. Full responsive and state managed by Context.
description1: User can see dinner, lunch, breakfast items individually on home page.
description2: User can sign in with google and he can sign up by email and password.
description3: Client can order food and purchase it.
description4: Customer when ordering food before shipping order.
description5: Customer information store by the shipping form.

name: RedX Courier Application
shortDescription: This is a full stack website. This is delivery related web application.
description1: Client Booking a Service for Delivery Products.
description2: User can see his total booking of order in his dashboard.
description3: Customer can see his registered service as pending or approved still.
description4: Admin can add a new service on this application.
description5: An Admin can Manage all registered service.

name: Rock Paper Scissor Game
shortDescription: A simple rock paper scissor game built by pure JavaScript and DOM manipulation.
description1: User played with Computer auto play.
description2: This game is over in 10 points.
description3: Who gain 10 points first he is the win of match.
description4: User clicking the image for turn game.
description5: Game over message and winning message given by alert message.
